main event: An unidentified aerial object was sighted over Navosta, Texas on August 7, 1951, observed moving in an erratic manner and described as high in the sky, very bright, and changing speed and direction.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 15 minutes and appeared to be under intelligent control., Witnesses included several residents of the Navosta area., The sighting was reported to have occurred around 1500 hours (3 PM)., The object was moving in an up and down motion before quickly disappearing., There was clear weather at the time of the sighting, and the object did not emit any sound.
witness description: several residents of the Navosta area
